plot: Rich girl Angela returns to school and falls for the local hunk. But when he refuses her advances, she pretends to be in love with the principal instead.
title: La estudiante, el rector y Jaimito el play-boy
plot_es: Rich girl Angela returns to school and falls for the local hunk. But when he refuses her advances, she pretends to be in love with the principal instead.
original_name: La ripetente fa l'occhietto al preside
plot_en: Rich girl Angela returns to school and falls for the local hunk. But when he refuses her advances, she pretends to be in love with the principal instead.

cast.role: The male Lover in the wardrobe
cast.name: Renzo Ozzano

cast.role: The female Lover in the wardrobe
cast.name: Franca Mantelli
